welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South St. Paul, a charming city known for its friendly community and picturesque scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving low-cost airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport offers modern amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, offering a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
